findings.title: Unprotected initializer
findings.description: The initializer functions are unprotected, allowing anyone to call them and potentially causing unintended behavior.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The 'transfer' function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to approve tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function does not have any access control or validation checks, allowing unauthorized users to transfer tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function does not have any access control or validation, allowing anyone to increase the allowance of an arbitrary address.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function lacks protection, potentially leading to unauthorized or unintended changes to allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is not protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential loss of funds.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is internal and lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to approve token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The _beforeTokenTransfer function is not properly protected and can be accessed by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unprotected _afterTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The _afterTokenTransfer function is not properly protected and can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected renounceOwnership function
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function is not protected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes in ownership.

findings.title: Unprotected transferOwnership function
findings.description: The function executes transfer of contract ownership to a specified wallet without proper access control.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is public and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized access to dividend withdrawal.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromDividends function
findings.description: The excludeFromDividends function can be called by anyone, including unauthorized users, which may lead to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected updateClaimWait function
findings.description: The updateClaimWait function is unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected updateMinimumTokenBalanceForDividends function
findings.description: The updateMinimumTokenBalanceForDividends function is declared as External and only accessible by the owner, but it lacks proper access control or validation, making it vulnerable to unauthorized updates.

findings.title: Unprotected process function
findings.description: The process function is unprotected, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected processAccount function
findings.description: The processAccount function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.
